entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
